short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide stuff that you don't want to see

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide stuff on web pages when they are blocking contents from us.

* When to use
1. When some contents are block your contents
2. When some contents are disturbing you from actual contents

* How to use
1. Click "Hide Stuff" icon on extension tray
2. Click "Active Select Mode" to select contents that you want to hide
3. Select contents you want to hide from website
4. Click "Deactivate Select Mode" to deactivate select mode
5. Enjoy your contents!
